revised_title: Discovery of a Mineral Balsam in an Italian Mine
tldr: In 1671, Marc-Antonio Castagna discovered a mineral balsam with a sweet scent in a mine in Italy. He found that the balsam had strong healing properties for the uterus and was able to cure various ailments. The balsam was stored in holes within stones, resembling white amber. This discovery raised curiosity about other valuable minerals that might be hidden in the area.
